episodes.synopsis: The rivalry between the Kings and the Sharks heats up in the regular season before players take time to relax during the All-Star Game break.
episodes.title: Episode 1

episodes.synopsis: In the run-up to the big game, the reigning Stanley Cup champs the Kings visit the White House, and both teams continue to plod through the season.
episodes.title: Episode 2

episodes.synopsis: The players spend time with their families as they continue their march toward the Stadium Series match, with both sides turning out hat tricks.
episodes.title: Episode 3

episodes.synopsis: With the Stadium Series game at hand, the players test out the outdoor rink's conditions before they finally square off on the ice.
episodes.title: Episode 4

video.title: Road to the NHL Stadium Series
video.synopsis: An all-access, behind-the-scenes experience unfolds as the Los Angeles Kings and San Jose Sharks journey to the NHL Stadium Series.
